question: Which sea houses "Pakri Islands"?
explanation: Pakri Islands is a group of two islands located in the Gulf of Finland, the easternmost arm of the Baltic Sea, under the administration of Estonia. Until World War II, Estonian Swedes were the inhabitants of this Island, after which they were forced to leave. From 1945 to 1992 these islands were used as a site for aerial bombardment by warsaw pact countries.
